verses.name: Genesis 19:6
verses.text: And Lot went out at the door unto them, and shut the door after him,

verses.name: Genesis 19:7
verses.text: And said, I pray you, brethren, do not so wickedly.

verses.name: Genesis 19:8
verses.text: Behold now, I have two daughters which have not known man; let me, I pray you, bring them out unto you, and do ye to them as is good in your eyes: only unto these men do nothing; for therefore came they under the shadow of my roof.
